attributes.action: David Cameron to un-resign and guide the UK through Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: The country does not need a Conservative power struggle and leadership debate. David Cameron was given a mandate to serve a 5 year term and offer the UK an EU referendum. He has a duty to abide by the will of the people and guide us through a Brexit. The vote to leave was not a vote to replace David Cameron.
attributes.background: The country does not need a Conservative power struggle and leadership debate. It needs continuity, stability and direction.

rejection.details: The resignation of an individual Minister, including the Prime Minister, is not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole. It is a decision for the individual concerned. The UK Government or Parliament cannot stop a Minister resigning.
